DOC.brief_summary: Excessive body weight become concern around world , example half American adult population overweight obese . The purpose study determine whether dietary supplement shake contain combination nutrients/ingredients individually show research study reduce hunger , enhance metabolism , reduce body 's ability 'store ' fat , enhance energy , promote healthy body weight composition 12 week . A study objective determine whether inclusion personal , easy use , energy track device measurement daily energy intake expenditure also help promotion healthy body weight body composition . In prospective , blind study 120 volunteer meet entrance criterion include BMI 25-35 kg/m2 sign inform consent form participate 12 week long study recruit . All subject consume multi-vitamin , mineral fish oil supplement . Subjects randomly assign control experimental group stratify BMI 25-30 > 30-35 kg/m2 , age , gender equal number subject strata across group . A subset subject also wear personal energy track device . Subjects instructed incorporate shake supplement current diet encourage incorporate fruit , vegetable , whole grain , healthy food current meal exercise least 30 minute five day per week .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Supplements Personal Energy Tracking Device Promote Maintain Healthy Weight
DOC.criteria: Between age 1865 year age . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 2535 Willing stop take nutritional supplement Currently take weight loss medication supplement Currently smoke Taking prescription medication Experienced least 10 pound weight loss past 2 month . History serious heart problem ( i.e . heart attack , angina , bypass surgery ) . Diagnosed diabetes ( insulin noninsulin dependent ) Known history gastrointestinal disease ( i.e . Crohn 's disease , chronic diarrhea , Inflammatory Bowel Disease ) Undergone surgical procedure weight loss ( i.e . gastroplasty , gastric bypass , gastrectomy , stomach stapling , gastric banding , etc ) . History stroke seizure activity Medical condition know affect serum lipid History uncontrolled hypertension current measure blood pressure diastolic 90 systolic 140 mm Hg A total serum cholesterol 240 mg/dL Known HIV infection Known history depression currently take antidepression medication Treated cancer last 5 year Known allergy supplement Known history eat disorder ( i.e . bulimia , anorexia nervosa ) Known severe swallow disorder For female , know pregnant breastfeeding try become pregnant Participating another clinical ( medical nutritional ) study likely enrol another medical nutritional protocol study
